trans-unit.source: Provides data for the layout event for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
The layout event occurs when the size or position of the designer or its contained components change.
trans-unit.target: 레이아웃 이벤트는 디자이너의 크기나 위치 또는 포함된 구성 요소가 변경될 때 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs> contains the graphics used to make layout changes and the designer theme to use for look and feel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs>에는 레이아웃을 변경하는 데 사용할 그래픽과 모양 및 느낌에 사용할 디자이너 테마가 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used the layout the designer.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> to use for look and feel.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> class with the specified graphics and designer theme.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 그래픽 및 디자이너 테마를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> associated with the root workflow.
An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> that contains theme information for the designer.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> is used to describe designer look and feel properties, such as colors, styles, and backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>는 색상, 스타일 및 배경과 같은 디자이너의 모양 및 느낌 속성을 설명하는 데 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> associated with the designer.
An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> that describes the designer look and feel.

If a designer has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> associated with it, the designer will use the look and feel properties described by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> to paint itself.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너가 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>와 연결된 경우 디자이너는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>에 의해 설명된 모양 및 느낌 속성을 사용하여 그립니다.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> is associated with the designer, the designer will use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> to repaint its look and feel properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>가 디자이너와 연결되지 않을 경우 디자이너는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>를 사용하여 모양 및 느낌 속성을 다시 그립니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to lay out the designer.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object used to lay out the designer.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너의 레이아웃에 사용하는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 개체 입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object provides methods for drawing objects on the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 개체는 표시 장치에 개체를 그리기 위한 메서드를 제공합니다.
